69 96 02 01 00                 - off
69 96 06 01 01 ff ff ff 7f     - on
69 96 06 01 01                 - this also turns it on.  Will probably use this one


Colours

|---------| -------------------- header
|         | ||------------------ red
|         | || ||--------------- green
|         | || || ||------------ blue
|         | || || || ||--------- nothing at all.  Probably white where LEDs have WW
69 96 05 02 7f 00 00 7f        - red
69 96 05 02 00 7f 00 7f        - green
69 96 05 02 00 00 7f 7f        - blue
69 96 05 02 ff ff ff ff        - white

In fact, you only need to provide RGB and can skip the last byte.  So do that because it's easier to make sense of.


Mode
|-----|---- -------------------- header
|        || ||------------------ mode
|              ||--------------- speed
69 96 03 04 02 01
69 96 03 04 01 01

Mode are numbered:
  03 00 to 03 15
  04 00 to 04 09

Speed is 01 fast to 0a slow ?  There are values accepted above this, but strange things happen

6996060101ffffff7f              on
